properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 8:29PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri...

Ohio River at Cairo

.Heavy rainfall that has fallen over the last few days...along with water
being let out of the dams at Land Between the Lakes...will cause rises
along most of the Ohio River basin. Cairo Illinois is expected to go above
flood stage on Saturday. Several other river points are being monitored
for possible warnings through the upcoming weekend.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Cairo
* from Saturday morning until further notice.
* At  8:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 37.2 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday morning and continue
to rise to near 44.5 feet by Saturday evening. Additional rises are
possible thereafter.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
